availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Grayson Springs, Grayson County, Kentucky. A Kentucky-born farmer. Married Nancy Jane Williams. Father of Mary (Witten) Coble, James Witten, Eliza Witten, Margaret Witten, Jeremiah M. Witten, Martha Witten, Sarah Witten, Sindrilla Witten, and John Hiram Witten.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, Grayson Springs post office, p. 19.

Find A Grave, Entry for Thomas Owen Witten (1822-1899), Find A Grave Memorial # 90975708, Rock Creek Church Cemetery, Rock Creek, Grayson County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=90975708&ref=acom (accessed 29 June 2017).
